section: Wrapped in heavy blankets provided by the nomads, you lie down and are soon lulled off to sleep by the bard’s droning song. Morning brings a crisp cold wind from the north, but you are well rested and your hosts see to it that you are given the best of their food. Recover 1 Stamina point if injured. It is time to bid farewell to the One-Eyed Crow clan. .
